Author: loosei
Text: I feel you. Same boat. Being able to "pinch" my stomach fat is how I measure my weight gain in "recovery."  Just know that to have a little fat around our ovaries is the normal disposition for girls. I get the self loathing feeling though, and I too wake up every morning promising myself that I will restrict, and then when I end up eating because I'm starving I feel like a failure and wish that I still was in the grips of my ED when it was 'easy.' Hope you get through this my love ðŸ’˜
